meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Steven Wijnberg Anita Israel Craig Schneider Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2782.

td.p: Steven Wijnberg, an assistant executive director originally from Johannesburg, South Africa
Anita Israel, a museum technician originally from Newburgh, New York
Craig Schneider, a health policy analyst from Boston, Massachusetts (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,601)

tr.td: MONTH-LONG OBSERVANCES
PLANTS
THE 1996 TONY AWARDS
HISTORIC HOMES
NORSE MYTHOLOGY
DOUBLE TALK NAMES

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', '(Anita: What is Quakers?)
(Alex: Quakers? [Looks to judges] [*], we\'ll give it to you.)

Quaker Oats

Anita
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Anita: What is rosemary?)
(Craig: What is sage?)
(Steven: What is thyme, Alex?)
(Alex: No! You had a 50-50 shot, you should have gone with [*]. We\'ve got about a minute to go in the round. Select again, Steven.)

parsley

CraigAnitaSteven
Triple Stumper
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Before revealing the responses] Well, there are a number of famous Catholic universities in the United States, but if you were in doubt, you should have gone with your first instinct which was to pick probably the most famous of them all.)
...
(Alex: [To Anita] Another good selection, but when I said the obvious it\'s because I\'m a football fan, and I was thinking of...)
(Anita: [*].)
(Alex: [*].
StevenWhat is the University of
$1,000
CraigWhat is Georgetown
$399
AnitaWhat is Loyola
$1,901
Notre Dame')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'French Catholic missionaries led by Father Edward F. Sorin founded this university in 1842')

tr.td: AMERICAN UNIVERSITIES
French Catholic missionaries led by Father Edward F. Sorin founded this university in 1842
Craig
Anita
Steven
2nd place: bedroom suite from Bassett
New champion: $4,199
3rd place: Magnavox television
Craig
Anita
Steven

25 R
(including 1 DD),
7 W
(including 1 DD)

6 R
(including 1 DD),
2 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
